document_data.name: Taverners' Confederation
document_data.mainbody: The '''Taverners' Confederation''' was the guildhall for tavern owner's in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located at the junction of [[Guild Alley]], [[Rogar Alley]], and the [[Hill Road]] in the southern section of Daggerford north of the drill field.
